title: A Memorandum for the Secretary of State on Expo 2027 Minnesota - Healthy People, Healthy Planet: Wellness and Well-Being for All | The White House
content: In accordance with Public Law 91-269, I have approved the recommendation for Federal recognition of the proposed “Expo 2027 Minnesota – Healthy People, Healthy Planet:  Wellness and Well-Being for All,” finding that such recognition will be in the national interest.Accordingly, I am requesting you to notify the Bureau of International Expositions of my actions.JOSEPH R. BIDEN JR.
